alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Taliaferro; Warren; Washington; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:01PM EDT until August 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Baldwin County in central Georgia... Warren County in east central Georgia... Hancock County in east central Georgia... Western Glascock County in east central Georgia... Northwestern Washington County in east central Georgia... Taliaferro County in east central Georgia... Wilkes County in east central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 701 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Point Peter to near Daniel Springs to near Plant Harlee Branch, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Washington, Warrenton, Sparta, Gibson, Crawfordville, Tignall, Norwood, Rayle, Mitchell, Sharon, Camak, Springfield, Beulah, Holliday Park, Powelton, Agricola, Lyneville, Jacksons Crossroads, and Lundberg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Taliaferro; Warren; Washington; Wilkes
